content: / 15 cm from cast on edge continue in st st in the round until work mea- sures 11 / 28 cm from cast on edge begin working crown as follows round 1 *k2tog ssk k10 11 repeat from * to end 96 104 sts rnds 2 4 6 8 knit round 3 *k2tog ssk k8 9 repeat from * to end 80 88 sts round 5 *k2tog ssk k6 7 repeat from * to end 64 72 sts round 7 *k2tog ssk k4 5 repeat from * to end 48 56 sts round 9 *k2tog ssk k2 3 repeat from * to end 32 40 sts round 10 knit size 1 only next round k2tog ssk to end 16 sts size 2 only next round k2tog ssk k1 to end 24 sts all sizes resume break yarn leaving a tail 8 / 20 cm long and thread onto yarn needle draw through re- maining sts and pull snugly to neatly close top of hat fasten_off and weave in end on wrong 3 ©2020 eweknit version 2 december 2020 questions email info@eweknit ca wwws eweknit ca ~ instagram eweknitto share finished projects by hashtagging #eweknitprojects
